explains: n. 欺骗，蒙骗；骗术，骗局

sentences.en: He was jailed for two years for fraud and deception.
sentences.cn: 他因诈骗与欺诈被监禁了两年。

sentences.en: He admitted conspiring to obtain property by deception.
sentences.cn: 他承认曾密谋通过欺骗获取财产。

sentences.en: She denies obtaining a pecuniary advantage by deception.
sentences.cn: 她否认通过欺骗获得了金钱方面的好处。
